name: LIT (itch) (Joaqstarr)
description:
Use your gas lamp and candle abilities to solve puzzles. Light torches by setting out gas and sparking it.  Pink torches must be lit at the same time. Don't light the TNT. The gas can pass through grates, but you cannot.

Controls:
  • Arrows/WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Z/RCLICK - Ignite
  • X/LCLICK - Gas Lamp
  • R - Reset
  • ESC/P - Pause
  • Enter - Select
CREDITS
  • Joaquin Royer - Programming, Sound, Design
  • Sam Valdes - Art
  • Procopolis - Music
  • Tennis Hype Crew
